text:
BJSS | Technology Consultant, Security Engineer, Data Scientist, BI Developer, Technical Architect, Platform Engineer, Head of AI, Chatbot Developer | United Kingdom | ONSITE | Full Time

Lots of roles, for a fast growing company!! BJSS is an award winnning business, providing Agile delivery across a range of sectors. Our focus is on building bespoke solutions for our clients. We get exposure to a variety of Technologies, especially new and emerging tech.

We are about 1,000 people in the UK and growing. Our approach is innovative and forward thinking. Think, established start-up. And we are looking for likeminded technologists to work with us.

Salary and benefits are very competitive, along with a great collaborative culture, newly refurbished London office and a very well-stocked kitchen.

Contact us - https://www.bjss.com/joinus/
